1.alert: System Alert: Ship Course has been altered. Manual readjustments required.

2.alert: System Alert: Engine Power has been changed to low power. Manual readjustments required.

3.alert: System Notice: Data System issues have been fixed.
3.message: I handled the Data System issue! - WK

4.alert: System Alert: Communications channel issues have been detected. Manual investigation required.

5.alert: System Alert: Power system issues have been detected. Manual investigation required.

6.alert: System Alert: Oxygen Level changes detected. Manual readjustments required.

7.alert: System Alert: Air Filtration System issues detected. Manual investigation required.

end-1.1: Everyone is gone. They're gone and I don't know what to do now.
end-1.2: I searched everywhere on the ship and can't find anyone.
end-1.3: I'm scared and I'm starting to remember more. But I don't want to remember more.
end-1.5: If you're reading this right now then It probably means I'm gone.
end-1.6: In this diary I have also listed the coordinates to everyone's gravestone on Planet X Ã† A-12.
end-1.7: To the family and friends of those beloved crewmates, I know I cannot be forgiven.
end-1.8: They died painlessly so I hope that can bring some semblance of peace, no matter how small, to your hearts.
end-1.11: I wanted to be stronger, for there to be a better ending.
end-1.12: If you hate me for what I have done I understand.
end-1.13: I tried so hard for a different ending. I wanted a different ending.
